item.title:
"The future cannot be predicted, but futures can be invented" -- Dennis Gabor 1963. "The best way to predict the future is to invent it" -- Alan Kay 1971
If you can't predict whether a technology is going to be beneficial or not, build it so it is.
https://t.co/JokWP3yPOF

item.title:
People often confuse the positions of knee and the ankle in most animals. Counscious of this, illustrator Satoshi Kawasaki imagined what would happen if human legs were drawn using animals' skeletons as a base
[human -> dog -> horse -> flamingo] source: https://t.co/oiIsYvmCAY https://t.co/NUaYelk7rk

Artists!
